text:
@SpeakerPelosi We can thank #IdiotTrump for this due to his disastrous handling of #coronavirus He sat on his hands for two months, called it a political hoax, then bragged that he was doing a "great" job. American deaths are on Trump's hands.
#TrumpIsKillingAmericans
